title: Welcome to Open Physics Education

content:
Open Physics Education is a community dedicated to making physics accessible and engaging for learners at all levels.
Our Mission We believe physics education should be:
Open – Free and openly available to everyone Accessible – Clear explanations and multiple learning approaches Community-driven – Built by educators and physicists for educators and physicists Quality – Rigorous content with real-world applications What We Do We create and curate:
Course materials – Lecture notes, problem sets, and activities Teaching resources – Lab manuals, simulations, and pedagogical guidance Research – Evidence-based practices for physics education Tools – Software and resources to support learning Philosophy Physics is for everyone. We believe that clear communication, interactive learning, and community support can help all students develop deep understanding of physics concepts.
Get Involved Interested in contributing? Whether you’re a teacher, student, researcher, or developer:
Check out our GitHub repositories Share resources and ideas Help improve our materials Build tools that support physics learning This work is driven by educators, for educators. Built with openness and collaboration in mind.
